about_the_game:
This is the second pack of the series!
This massive pack contains 742 monsters (including color variations) from the fantasy world, perfect for RPG battles. These high quality monsters would liven up the battle scenes!
This time we have added original designs to 30 in response to user requests!
+ As a bonus, there are also 7 patterns of battle backgrounds that can be used for events and other purposes!

Original monster images: 30 monster designs + color variations + large size monsters (742 in total)
7 bonus battle background images


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
